name: pm13.13a
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0
body: |- wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))

stmt.origin: biimpac(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))

comment: One result of theorem *13.13 in [WhiteheadRussell] p. 178. A note on the section - to make the theorems more usable, and because inequality is notation for set theory (it is not defined in the predicate calculus section), this section will use classes instead of sets. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 3-Jun-2011.)
